name: glisten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to shine by reflecting light from a wet or smooth surface: The grass glistened in the early-morning dew.glisten with His eyes glistened with tears. Synonyms
gleam
glint
shine

(esp. of wet surfaces) to shine brightly: His eyes glistened with tears.
